attributes.action: Revoke the fortnight travel quarantine period for anyone arriving in the UK.
attributes.additional_details:
allowing a group of individuals such as,
Road haulage and freight workers
Medical officials who are traveling to help fight coronavirus
Anyone arriving from the Republic of Ireland, the Channel Islands, or the Isle of Man
Seasonal agricultural workers.
would not stop the spread of the virus as there are millions of people occupying those professions of standings and like other members of society they are at risk of also contracting and spreading the virus, like the rest of us. REVOKE THE BAN.
attributes.background: I find this 14 day period to be irrational, Revoking the 14 day period of self-isolation on travel passengers will allow, more income into the United Kingdom from traveling, also it shall prevent businesses such as hotels and/or airlines from suffering great financial loss or bankruptcy.In addition,

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/320329

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

www.gov.uk/coronavirus
https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

The Government has also created an online service to help you out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips

You can read impartial analysis of the Government response to coronavirus and policy developments here: https://commonslibrary.parliament.uk/coronavirus/

You may also be interested to know that because of the large number of petitions that have been started in relation to coronavirus, the Petitions Committee has been questioning the Government about its response to the coronavirus outbreak.
 
Find out more: https://committees.parliament.uk/work/192/the-governments-response-to-coronavirus/
